chain.description:
{
"return_type": "give_answer",
"final_answer": "Sure! Here are some movie-themed Chuck Norris jokes for you:

1. In the X-Men movies, none of the X-Men super-powers are done with special effects. Chuck Norris is the stuntman for every character. [Read More](https://api.chucknorris.io/jokes/etu5stytromsxrgybafqca)

2. In the movie "The Matrix", Chuck Norris is the Matrix. If you pay close attention in the green "falling code" scenes, you can make out the faint texture of his beard. [Read More](https://api.chucknorris.io/jokes/c-3yrrglr0ouxifeo2rzsw)

To plan future movie nights around your favorite NBA team's games, here is the game schedule and team standings of the Boston Celtics:

- Game 1: Boston Celtics vs. Charlotte Hornets on January 30, 2019. The Celtics won with a score of 126-94. [More Info](https://www.nba.com/game/0021800739)

- Game 2: Boston Celtics vs. LA Clippers on February 9, 2019. The Celtics won with a score of 112-123. [More Info](https://www.nba.com/game/0021800854)

I hope you have a great movie night with your friends!"
}

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

"final_answer": "Sure! Here are some movie-themed Chuck Norris jokes for you:

2. In the movie "The Matrix", Chuck Norris is the Matrix. If you pay close attention in the green "falling code" scenes, you can make out the faint texture of his beard. [Read More](https://api.chucknorris.io/jokes/c-3yrrglr0ouxifeo2rzsw)

To plan future movie nights around your favorite NBA team's games, here is the game schedule and team standings of the Boston Celtics:

- Game 1: Boston Celtics vs. Charlotte Hornets on January 30, 2019. The Celtics won with a score of 126-94. [More Info](https://www.nba.com/game/0021800739)

- Game 2: Boston Celtics vs. LA Clippers on February 9, 2019. The Celtics won with a score of 112-123. [More Info](https://www.nba.com/game/0021800854)

I hope you have a great movie night with your friends!"

answer_generation.query: I'm planning a movie night with my friends and we want to start the evening with some jokes. Can you suggest some movie-themed Chuck Norris jokes? Also, provide us with the game schedule and team standings of our favorite NBA team to plan future movie nights around their games.
